element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm changes the type of numerical data of a raster image.

element.name: INPUT
element.text: the raster layer where the type of data should be changed.

element.name: TYPE
element.text: the type of numerical data to be selected from the following: byte, short, int, float, double.

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The new layer with the selected data type
